title.rendered: Lake Ave. Drop-Off and Pick-Up Procedures

content.rendered:
Arrival

  • 9:00 a.m. – Students who are having breakfast enter the building.
  • 9:10 a.m. Students enter the building by grade level.
  • The doors close at 9:20 a.m. . Students will be marked tardy if they arrive to school after 9:20 a.m.  If a student is tardy, a parent/guardian MUST walk them into school to sign them in.

Dismissal

  • Student walkers are dismissed out the front door between 3:23 and 3:31 p.m.
  • All students wait on the front porch until they are united with their parent/guardian.
  • Parking for student pick-up purposes is NOT permitted on Regent Street.
